title: Use DraftKings promo code to get $300 bonus bets, free NBA League Pass by betting Eagles-Packers, Bulls-Spurs - CBS Sports
description: The Green Bay Packers and Philadelphia Eagles will square off on Monday Night Football to conclude Week 10 of the 2025 NFL season. It will be
body:
The Green Bay Packers and Philadelphia Eagles will square off on Monday Night Football to conclude Week 10 of the 2025 NFL season. It will be one of the most popular games of the entire week for online sports betting, and with the latest DraftKings promo code, new users can receive $300 in bonus bets and three free months of NBA League Pass. The SportsLine model projects the Packers to defend home field and exit MNF with a victory while covering as 1.5-point home favorites in its Monday best bets at DraftKings Sportsbook. The over/under for Eagles vs. Packers is 45 points. The model has also found value on the hardwood, projecting the Chicago Bulls to upset the San Antonio Spurs at +140. One of SportsLine's top experts also has a college basketball bet on Xavier vs. Santa Clara. Claim the latest DraftKings promo code, where new users get $300 in bonus bets if your first $5 bet wins, plus 3 months of NBA League Pass free: Check out our DraftKings promo code review for full details.The model, which simulates every NFL game 10,000 times, is up well over $7,000 for $100 players on top-rated NFL picks since its inception. The model enters Week 10 on a sizzling 47-29 run on top-rated picks dating back to 2024. Anybody following its NFL betting picks at sportsbooks and on betting sites could have seen strong returns.Monday best bets at DraftKings SportsbookPackers (-1.5) vs. EaglesBulls to defeat the Spurs (+140)Santa Clara vs. Xavier: Under 157.5 pointsCombining the model's three picks into a Monday parlay at DraftKings would result in a payout of +816 (risk $100 to win $816). Bet it at DraftKings here:
Packers (-1.5) vs. EaglesThe Packers have played up and down to their competition at times this season, and although that's delivered frustrating losses for Green Bay fans against the Panthers and Browns while defeating the Lions and the Commanders when they were healthier earlier in the season, there is no bigger opponent to play up for than the defending Super Bowl champions, especially when they play in your conference. The Green Bay defense has the tools to take away what Philadelphia does best also, with the second-best run defense at 89.4 yards allowed per game and the fewest passing yards per attempt (5.8) in the NFL. The model projects the Packers to win and cover in 54% of simulations. Back Green Bay at DraftKings Sportsbook, where new users get $300 in bonus bets and 3 free months of NBA League Pass:Bulls to defeat the Spurs (+140)Chicago won six of its first seven games to open the new season, and although it has lost back-to-back contests, the Bulls return home, where they are 5-0 this season. Chicago has home victories over teams such as the Pistons, Knicks and 76ers, knocking off strong opponents on its home floor this year. Josh Giddey is nearly averaging a triple-double at 21.4 points, 9.6 rebounds and 9.3 assists per game this season. Those numbers increase to 23.6 points, 10.2 rebounds and 9.8 assists at home this season, as the model projects the Bulls to win in 52% of simulations, showcasing strong value at plus-money odds. Back Chicago at DraftKings Sportsbook, where new users get $300 in bonus bets and 3 free months of NBA League Pass:Santa Clara vs. Xavier: Under 157.5 points"Herb Sendek has his Santa Clara shooting lots of three-balls as in recent seasons, but it remains to be seen if he has similar marksmen on the roster," legendary SportsLine expert Bruce Marshall said. "In Friday's 79-67 win over McNeese, the Broncos hit 12 of 31 triples, though it took 5 of 8 from Villanova transfer guard Sash Gavalyugov to up the percentage. While SCU's not quite a well-oiled machine yet, Xavier surely isn't for its new HC Richard Pitino (whose dad Rick once had Sendek on his staff). It might be asking a lot of these two sides to ramp up the scoreline." Back the Under at DraftKings Sportsbook, where new users get $300 in bonus bets and 3 free months of NBA League Pass:
Want more Monday Night Football, NBA, college basketball picks?You've seen some of the model's Monday best bets. Now, get against the spread, total and money-line picks for all games, including NFL, NBA, college basketball, college football, NHL and more, all from the model that's simulated every game 10,000 times.
